Need to understand why this is happening for M6.

I'm not able to reproduce.  Here are the steps I followed:

1)  Extract fresh I20050329-1105 build.
2)  Build latest PDE plugins from HEAD and install ontop of extracted build.
3)  Start clean workspace and import all plugins with source (except swt) into 
workspace.

I also tried importing swt, but PDE does not seem to like this.  All plugins 
that use org.eclipse.swt packages fail to compile.  I verified this is not a 
resolver issue because all plugins in the State are resolved and the PDE 
classpath containers seem to correctly include swt on the classpath of the 
projects.

Can you reproduce this consistently?  What steps do you use?

>I also tried importing swt, but PDE does not seem to like this.

Thanks Tom for catching this.  It's all fixed up now.
